lead_paragraph: Kerry Lonergan has kept his bookmaker driving a Mercedes Benz for years. He's also had shares in many slow racehorses, and like all owners, remains convinced that the next one he buys will be the next Secretariat. He lives in Brisbane, Australia.
snippet: The Melbourne Cup is a party. One big, boozy, betting party, right across Australia -- and indeed wherever Aussies are gathered anywhere in the world.

headline.main: Let the Melbourne Cup Party Begin

abstract: The Melbourne Cup is a party. One big, boozy, betting party, right across Australia -- and indeed wherever Aussies are gathered anywhere in the world.
